description: NFTs used to represent easily-reproducible items such as photos, videos, audio, and other types of digital files as unique items (analogous to a certificate of authenticity), and use blockchain technology to establish a verified and public proof of ownership. NFT maker must be think art is worthless. Minted : Mint 12 nft, for starter mint 5 nft. Redeem : please send email to [support@clothbitc.com](mailto:support@clothbitc.com) and fill claim form
name: NFT Maker (Art is Worthless) #2
